745:687: na ca manyasi nāvamanyase sakalaṃ lokamimaṃ sadaivatam ||15||
745:688: na ca vismayase kadāvana prakṛtistheṣu calācaleṣu ca |
745:697: bhavaduḥkhamidaṃ sahetukaṃ bhavaduḥkhasya ca yaḥ parikṣayaḥ |
745:700: na ca te sadṛśaḥ kuto'dhikastriṣu lokeṣvapi naiva vidyate ||21||

745:706: ayaśaśca yaśaśca te samaṃ samamākruṣṭamathāpi vanditam ||24||
745:710: samameva ca varttase mune paribhāṣāsu śubhāsu vākṣu ca ||26||

745:745: yathā yathā tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam |

745:765: atha sā devatā jihnīya nagnarūpā ekānte'pakrāntā |

745:774: apraviśanneva mathurāṃ gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanaṃ gata iti śrutvā ca punaḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ sthālīpākaṃ samupānīya śakaṭe āropya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |

745:786: yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavo gardabhasya yakṣasya bhavanamupaniśritya viharanti sarve te upasthānaśālāyāṃ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipatitāḥ |

745:820: tatra otalāyano nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoga iti vistaraḥ |
745:821: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya otalāyāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat|

745:830: bhagavatā teṣāṃ tribhiḥ padairdharmo deśito yāvaccāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannāḥ |

745:859: atha bhagavān vihāraṃ gataḥ purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapya evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |

745:934: anena kuśalamūlena yo'sau bhagavatā kāśyapenottaro nāma mānavo vyākṛto bhaviṣyati |

745:976: śramaṇo gautamaḥ sarvasāmantarājānaṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito'rhatsaṃmataḥ |

745:1002: yadyahamenamanusaṃvarṇayeyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā śramaṇo gautamaḥ prasādamutpādayiṣyati |
745:1008: aho vata me na rājyacyutiḥ syād (vā)
745:1010: upādhyāya ko'sāvupāyaḥ syādyena me na rājyacyutirbhavennāpi jīvitasyāntarāya iti |
745:1012: yadi devastraimāsīmadarśanapathe tiṣṭhati evaṃ devasya na rājyacyutirbhavati nāpi jīvitasyāntarāyaḥ |
745:1018: ya upasaṃkrāmati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti |
745:1020: āyuṣmānānandaḥ kālyamevotthāya yenāgnidattasya brāhmaṇarājyasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ yāvat paśyatyagnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya pauruṣeyā alpotsukān kṛtvā tiṣṭhanti |
745:1024: na tvagnidattena brāhmaṇarājena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghastraimāsīṃ sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pravāritaḥ |
745:1025: te yūyamalpotsukāstiṣṭhatha nāhāraṃ sajjīkurutha nāsanaprajñaptim kiṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhaktacchedaṃ kariṣyatīti |
745:1028: paṃcānāṃ śatānāmāhāraṃ sajjīkurutaṃ praṇītaṃ prabhūtaṃ ceti |
745:1033: ya upasaṃkrāmati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti |
745:1036: athāyuṣmānando yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ upasaṃkramya etatprakaraṇaṃ bhagavato vistareṇārocayati |
745:1038: gacchānanda saṃghāṭīmādāya paścācchramaṇaṃ ca vairaṃbhye rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣvārocaya |
745:1039: yo yuṣmākaṃ bhavantaḥ utsahate buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca traimāsīṃ bhojayituṃ bhojayatviti |
745:1040: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya saṃghāṭīmādāya praścācchramaṇaṃ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgārakeṣvārocayati |
745:1041: yo yuṣmākaṃ bhavanta utsahate buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ traimāsīṃ bhojayituṃ sa bhojayatviti vairaṃbhyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ kathayanti |
745:1043: api tu anena kalirājena ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam |
745:1044: nānyena kenacit traimāsīmupanimaṃtrya buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho bhojayitavyaḥ |
745:1045: yo bhojayati tasya badho daṇḍa iti |
745:1046: yāvaduttarāpathāt sārthavāhaḥ paṃcāśvaśatāni paṇyamādāya vairaṃbhyamanuprāptaḥ sa saṃlakṣayati |
745:1052: śrutaṃ cānena rājñā ayaṃ cāyaṃ ca kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ |
745:1058: āryānanda mayā aśvājāneyasya dvau yavaprasthau prajñaptau |
745:1060: yadi bhagavānutsahate yavān paribhoktumahaṃ bhagavataḥ prasthadvayamanuprayacchāmi |
745:1065: mayaivaitāni karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāni |
745:1066: avaśyaṃbhāvīni mayaivaitāni karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni ko'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati |
745:1067: na hi karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante |
745:1075: yo yuṣmākamutsahate tathāgatena sārdhaṃ vairaṃbhye traimāsīṃ yavān paribhoktuṃ sa śilākāṃ gṛhṇātviti |
745:1076: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya śilākāṃ cārayitumārabdhaḥ |
745:1079: bhagavannahaṃ vāyvābādhiko notsahe traimāsīṃ yavān paribhoktumiti |
745:1082: tato bhagavān bhikṣudvayaunaiḥ paṃcabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ vairaṃbhye varṣā upagataḥ |
745:1083: āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau triśaṅkuṃ parvataṃ gatvā varṣā upagatau |
745:1084: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa divyayā sudhayā pravāritau |
745:1089: evaṃ bhadanteti āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratyaṃśamādāya yenānyatamā vṛddhā strī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
745:1094: api tveṣā taruṇikā dārikā asyāṃ anuprayaccha |
745:1097: bhagini śakṣyasi tvaṃ tathāgatasyārthāya yavān parikarmīkartumiti |
745:1107: yadyahamasyā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kariṣye gambhīrā buddhadharmāḥ sthānametadvidyate (yadasau na vijñāsyatīti )
745:1110: rājño bhaginī cakravartino loke prādurbhāvātsaptānāṃ ratnānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
745:1113: cakraratnasya hastiratnasyāśvarasya maṇiratnasya strīratnasya gṛhapatiratnasya pariṇāyakaratnasya saptamasya |
745:1114: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvātkathaṃrūpasya cakraratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
745:1115: iha bhagini rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ śiraḥ snātopavāsairalaṃ kṛtasya upari prāsādatalagatasyāmātyagaṇaparivṛtasya pūrvasyāṃ diśi cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati sahasrāraṃ sanābhikaṃ sanemikaṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ śubhamakarmārakṛtaṃ divyaṃ (sarva) sauvarṇam |
745:1117: yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya tadeva poṣadhe paṃcadaśyāṃ pūrvavadyāvatsarvasauvarṇam |
745:1119: addhāhamasmi rājā cakravartīti cakraratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāma utthāyāsanādekāṃsamutarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya taccakraratnamubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ pratigṛhya vāme pāṇau pratiṣṭhāpya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā anuvartayati |
745:1120: jayasva bho cakraratna yenāryaḥ purāṇaścakravartipatha iti |
745:1123: bhyudgamya pūrveṇa prāyāsīdyenāryaḥ pūrāṇaścakravartipathaḥ anveti rājā cakravartī taccakraratnaṃ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena |
745:1124: yaśmiṃśca pradeśe taccakraratnaṃ pratitiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī vāsaṃ kalpayati sārdhaṃ catu (raṅgeṇaba) lakāyena |
745:1125: ( ye khalu) pūrvaśyāṃ diśi koṭṭarājānaste yena rājā cakravartī tenopasaṃkrāmanti |
745:1129: ime devasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca (subhikṣā)
745:1133: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni vijitāni samanuśāsatha dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa |
745:1139: nmahāsamudraṃ pratyuttīrya dakṣiṇena paścimenottareṇa prāyāsīdyenāryaḥ purāṇaścakravartipathaḥ |
745:1143: anveti rājā cakravartī taccakraratnaṃ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena |
745:1144: yasminpradeśe taccakraratnaṃ pratitiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī (vāsaṃ kalpayati)
745:1151: ime devasya janapadā ṛddhāśca sphītāśca kṣemāśca subhikṣāścākīrṇavahujanamanuṣyāśca |
745:1154: tena hi yūyaṃ grāmaṇyaḥ svakasvakāni vijitāni samanuśāsatha dharmeṇa mādharmeṇa |
745:1155: mā ca vaḥ kasyacidadharmacāriṇo rāṣṭre vāso rocatāmiti |
745:1157: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvādasyaivaṃrūpasya cakraratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
745:1158: rājño bhagivi cakravartino loke prādurbhāvātkathaṃrūpasya hastiratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
745:1159: iha bhagini rājñaścakravartino hastī bhavati sarvaśvetaḥ kumudavarṇaḥ saptāṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhito'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ |
745:1163: atha rājā cakravartī saṃkhyātaṃ hastidamakaṃ dūtena prakroṣyedamavocat idaṃ tvayā saumya saṃkhyātaṃ hastiratnaṃ kṣiprameva sudāntaṃ kṛtvāsmākamupanayitavyamiti |
745:1164: evaṃ deva iti saṃkhyāto hastidamako rājñaścakravartinaḥ pratiśrutya hastiratnamekāhnā sarvacāraṇebhirupasaṃkrāmati |
745:1171: atha rājā cakravartī taddhastiratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamaye taddhi (hasti)
745:1175: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvādasyaivaṃrūpasya hastiratnasya prādurbhāvo bhavati |
745:1176: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvāt kathaṃ rūpasyāśvaratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
745:1177: iha bhagini rājñaścakravartinaḥ aśvo bhavati sarvanīlaḥ kṛṣṇaśirā manojño javano'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ |
745:1180: atha rājā cakravartī saṃkhyātamaśvadamakaṃ dūtena prakoṣyedamavocat |
745:1181: idaṃ tvayā saumya saṃkhyātamaśvaratnaṃ kṣiprameva sudāntaṃ kṛtvāsmākamupanayitavyamiti |
745:1182: evaṃ deveti saṃkhyāto'śvādamako rājñaścakravartinaḥ pratiśrutya tadaśvaratnamekāhnā sarvacāraṇairupasaṃkrāmati |
745:1184: tadyathānye aśvā anekavārṣikā anekavarṣagaṇadāntāḥ sarvacāraṇebhiparusaṃkramyamānāḥ sarvacāraṇaiḥ pratigṛhnanti |
745:1187: dāntaṃ deva bhadramaśvaratnaṃ yasyedānīṃ devaḥ kālaṃ manyate |
745:1188: atha rājā cakravartī aśvaratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmaḥ sūryasyābhyudgamanakālasamaye tadaśvaratnamabhiruhyemāmeva samudraparyantāṃ mahāpṛthivī (manvāhiṇḍya)
745:1190: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvādasyaivaṃrūpasyāśvaratnasya loke prādurbhāvo bhavati |
745:1193: iha bhagini rājñaścakravartino maṇirbhavati aṣṭāṃśo vaiḍūryaḥ śubho jātimānaccho viprasannaḥ anāvilaḥ |
745:1196: ratnaṃ mīmāṃsitukāmoṃdhakāratamiśrāyāṃ rātryāṃ śanairmandaṃ mandaṃ deve vṛṣṭāyamāne vidyutsu niścarantīṣu maṇiratnaṃ dhvajāgre āropyodyānabhūmiṃ niryāti sārdhaṃ caturaṃgeṇa valakāyena |
745:1202: rājño bhagini cakravartino loke prādurbhāvātkathaṃrūpa (sya strīra)
745:1204: iha bhagini rājñaścakravartinaḥ strī bhavati abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikī nātigaurī nātiśyāmā madgurucchanirvātidīrghā nātihrasvā supratiṣṭhitā nātikṛśā nātisthūlā nātyutsadamāṃsā (tanugā) strī |
745:1206: sparśāni gātrāṇi uṣṇe śītasaṃsparśāni gātrāṇi kāliṅgaprāvāramṛdusaṃsparśāni |
745:1207: tasyāḥ khalu bhagini sarvaromakūpebhyaścandanagandho vāti mukhācca (utpalagandhaḥ) |
745:1209: nānandaḥ strīratnaṃ vibhajati tāvattayā dārikayā te yavāḥ parikarmitāḥ |
745:1211: ārya anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājñaścakravartinaḥ strīratnaṃ syāmiti |
745:1218: kima) bhūt te ānanda tayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdhamantarākathāsamudāhāraḥ |
745:1219: tena hyānanda yāvāṃste'bhūttayā brāhmaṇadārikayā sārdhamantarākathāsamudāhārastat sarvamasmākaṃ vistareṇārocaya |
745:1223: kasmāttvayānanda tayā dārikayā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ na kṛtam |
745:1225: gambhīrā buddhadharmāḥ sthānametadvidyate yadasau dārikā na vijñāsyatīti |
745:1228: sa cettvayā tasyā buddhavarṇodāharaṇaṃ kṛtamabhaviṣyat sthānametadvidyate yattu yāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avaivartikaṃ cittamutpāditamabhaviṣyat |
745:1229: api tvānanda bhaviṣyatyasau dārikā rājñaścakravartinaḥ strīratnam |
745:1233: iti śrutvā yaiḥ paṃcabhirdārikāśatairdyavūnairbhikṣudvayonānāṃ paṃcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāṃ yavāḥ parikarmitāḥ |
745:1236: yāvadbhagavān yavānparibhoktumārabdhaḥ āyuṣmānānando viklavaḥ aśrūṇi pramoktumārabdhaḥ |
745:1237: bhagavatā teṣu janmaparivarteṣu karacaraṇaśiraśchedādīni dānāni dattvā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ sarvajñatvamavāpya idānīṃ koṭarayavānbhakṣayatīti |
745:1240: bhagavānbhadanta cakravartikule jāto rājyamapahāya prabrajitaḥ karacaraṇaśirādīni dānāni dattvā tribhiḥ kalpāsaṃkhyeyaiḥ sarvajñatvamavāpya idānīṃ koṭarayavānbhakṣayatīti |
745:1242: ākṣāṃkṣasi tvamānanda tathāgatasya daṃṣṭrantaravinirgatān yavān paribhoktum |
745:1244: tato bhagavatā āyuṣmata ānandāya daṃṣṭrāntaravinirgatānāṃ yavānā (meko dattaḥ)|
745:1247: yadi tathāgataḥ prākṛtamapyāhāraṃ paribhuṃkte tadapi tathāgatasyānnaśatarasaṃ saṃparivartate |
745:1249: agnidatto brāhmaṇarājo buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghamupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe sthito bhagavān vairaṃbhye yavān paribhuṃkte iti |
745:1250: sāmantarājairapi śrutaṃ tairagnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam |
745:1251: te praveśaṃ na labhante dvāri sthitāḥ |
745:1252: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutaṃ tena paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ preṣitāni |
745:1254: bahuśo mayā śramaṇo gautamo viheṭhito na kadācidavatāro labdhaḥ |
745:1255: atrāpi tāvadasya praharāmi iti viditvā āyuṣmantamānandamātmānaṃ vinirmāya teṣāṃ paṃcānāṃ śakaṭaśatānāṃ purataḥ sthitvā kathayati |
745:1258: (ārya) ānanda agnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghamupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe sthito bhagavānvairaṃbhye yavān paribhuṃkte iti |
745:1259: anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā śrutvaitāni parṇopagūḍhasya śāle rbhagavato'rthāya paṃca śakaṭaśatāni preṣitāni iti |
745:1262: yadi bhagavān ākāśe pātraṃ prasārayati tadapi devāsrayastriṃśā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pūrayanti |
745:1272: tena tāvad dṛṣṭaṃ yāvattāni śakaṭāni nābhiṃ yāvannimagnāni |
745:1274: tatra bhagavatā vairaṃbhye yavāḥ paribhuktāḥ sārdhaṃ dvayonaiḥ paṃcabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ |
745:1275: āyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyāṃ triśaṃkuke parvate varṣopagatābhyāṃ divyā sudhā paribhuktā |
745:1278: sa sārthavāhastāmeva rātriṃ śuciṃ praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samupānīya pūrvavadyāvadbhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṃ bhagavataḥ pādayornipatya praṇidhanaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ |
745:1279: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājā bhaveyaṃ cakravartī aśvājāneyaḥ putre yuvarājastānyapi paṃcāśvaśatāni paṃcaputraśatāṇi |
745:1280: yā sā dārikā bhagavatā strīratnaṃ yāni pañca dārikāśatāni tasyāḥ paricārikā iti |
745:1281: tato bhagavāṃstasya sārthavāhasya cetasā cittamājñāya taṃ sārthavāhamidamavocat |
745:1282: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ sārthavāha rājā cakravartī aśvājāneyaste putro yuvarājastānyapi paṃcāśvaśatāni paṃcaputraśatāni |
745:1284: tānyapi dyūnāni paṃcadārikāśatāni tasyāḥ paricārikā iti |
745:1288: uṣitāḥ smo mahārāja tava vijite avalokito bhava |
745:1291: āyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yenāgnidattasya brāhmaṇarājasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
745:1292: tena khalu samaye nāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ puṇyāhamāgamayaṃstiṣṭhati |
745:1294: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājastenopasaṃkrama |
745:1296: ānando bhikṣurdvāre tiṣṭhati deva draṣṭukāma iti |
745:1297: evamārya iti dauvārikapuruṣaḥ āyuṣmata ānandasya pratiśrutya yenāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
745:1313: uṣitāḥ smo mahārāja tava vijite traimāsīm |
745:1320: devo'pratyakṣitarājyastvaṃ yo bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsīmupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ |
745:1325: sa saṃmūrchitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ nipatito mahatā jalapariṣekeṇa pratyāgataprāṇaḥ amātyānāhūya pṛcchati |
745:1332: api tu adyāpyāhāraḥ sajjīkṛta eva 'thāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
745:1333: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
745:1334: ekāntaniṣaṇṇamagnidattaṃ brāhmaṇarājaṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarhayati pūrvavadyāvatsaṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
745:1336: atyayo bhagavannatyayaḥ sugata yathā bālo yathā mūḍho yathāvyakto yathākuśalo yo'haṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsīmupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ |
745:1337: tasya mama bhagavannatyayaṃ jānato'tyayaṃ paśyataḥ atyayamatyayataḥ pratigṛhṇīśvānukampāmupādāya |
745:1338: tathyaṃ te mahārāja atyayamatyayata āgamā yathā bālo yathā mūḍho yathāvyakto yathākuśalo yastvaṃ tathāgataṃ traimāsīmupanimaṃtryādarśanapathe vyavasthitaḥ |
745:1339: uatastvaṃ mahārāja atyayaṃ jānāsyatyayaṃ paśyasi taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā deśayasi vṛddhireva te pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ |
745:1341: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān yāvajjīvaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti |
745:1343: tathāgato mahārāja alpāyuṣke kāle jātaḥ prabhūtaṃ ca kāryaṃ karaṇīyam |
745:1348: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti |
745:1350: yadyahamasyaikabhaktakamapi nādhivāsayāmi sthānametadvidyate yadyagnidatto brāhmaṇarāja uṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti viditvā adhivāsitaṃ bhagavatā tūṣṇīṃbhāvena |
745:1351: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājo bhagavatastūṣṇīṃ bhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato'ntikāt prakrānto yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmtaḥ |
745:1352: upasaṃkramyāmātyānāmaṃtrayate bhavantaḥ ko'sau upāyaḥ syādyena sarvo'yamāhāro buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṃghena paribhukto bhavediti |
745:1358: bhavanto yāvānayamāhāraḥ sarvametatsamantāt pṛthivyāmākirata iti taiḥ sarvaṃ samantādākīrṇam |
745:1359: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājastāmeva rātriṃ śucipraṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samupānīya pūrvabadyāvadbhagavān purastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
745:1361: idānīmayaṃ kalirājo vibhavaṃ darśayatīti viditvā khādanīyabhojanīyasya pṛthivyāmākīrṇasyopari pārṣṇiprahāro dattaḥ |
745:1366: yaḥ kaścidādīnavo bhikṣavaḥ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ mukhābhyavahāryaṃ pādena spṛśantīti viditvā bhikṣunāmantrayate sma |
745:1367: amukena bhikṣavo mahallabhikṣuṇā saṃjātāmarṣeṇa khādanīyabhojanīyasya mukhābhyavahāryasya pṛthivyāmākīrṇasyopari pārṣṇiprahāro datta iti |
745:1371: athāgnidatto brāhmaṇarājaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ santarpayati pūrvavadyāvaddhautahastamapanītapātraṃ nīcataramāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
745:1373: yā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati |
745:1374: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmayayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
745:1375: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavastrayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānāmatyayātkṛtacīvarā niṣṭhitacīvarāḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
745:1376: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte'sthāt |
745:1380: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
745:1381: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yena karacaraṇaśiracchedādinā dānasaṃbhāreṇa yāvaddinajanaṃ saṃtarpya kalpāsaṃkhyeyaṃ yattrayaṃ sattvārthe ātmānaṃ parikhedyāpagatasarvakāryo vairaṃbhye koṭarayavānparibhuktavānsārdhaṃ bhikṣudyvūnaiḥ paṃcabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ |
745:1384: tathāgatenaiva etāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām |
745:1385: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokacidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān |
745:1387: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhāntāmanyatamo gaṇavācako brāhmaṇaḥ pāñcaśatikaṃ gaṇaṃ brāhmaṇakānmaṃtrānpāṭhayati |
745:1388: sarvalokasya cātyarthaṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito'rhatsaṃmataḥ |
745:1389: yata eva vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptastata eva taṃ na kaścitsatkaroti na gurukaroti na mānayati na pūjayati |
745:1392: yāvatsaṃbahulāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīmanuprāptāḥ |
745:1393: tato nānāsūpikarasopetasya bhaktasya pātrāṇi pūrayitvā nirgacchanti |
745:1395: bho bhikṣavaḥ paśyāmi kīdṛśaḥ piṇḍapāto labdha iti |
745:1398: nārhantīme muṇḍakāḥ śramaṇakā nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ śālyodanaṃ paribhoktum |
745:1402: nārhantyeva ime muṇḍakāḥ śramaṇakā nānāsūpikarasavyaṃjanopetaṃ śālyodanaṃ paribhoktum |
745:1404: tatra ca dvau māṇavakau śrāddhau bhadraukalyāṇāśayau |
745:1407: mahātmāna ete'rhantyeva divyāṃ sudhāṃ paribhoktuṃ na koṭarayavāniti |
745:1409: yau'sau vipaśyitathāgatena gaṇavācako brāhmaṇaḥ ahameva sa tena kālena tena samayena |
745:1411: nāni paṃca māṇavakaśatāni etānyeva paṃca bhikṣuśatāni |
745:1412: yau tau dvau māṇavakau śrāddhau bhadrau kalyāṇāśayau etāveva tau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣū |
745:1413: yanmayā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ śrāvakāṇāmantike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ dyvūnaiśca paṃcabhirmāṇavakaśatairanumoditaṃ dvābhyāṃ tu nānumoditaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenaitarhi tathāgatena vairaṃbhye koṭarayavāḥ paribhuktāḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣūdyvūnaiḥ paṃcabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ |
745:1415: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmanāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavadyāvadekāntaśulkeṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
745:1420: atha bhagavāndakṣiṇapaṃcāle janapadacārikāṃ carannayodhyāmanuprāptaḥ ayodhyāyāṃ viharati nadyā gaṅgāyāstīte |
745:1424: sādhu me bhagavaṃstathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato'ntike saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvā eko vyapakṛṣṭo'pramattaḥ ātāpi prahitātmā vihareyam |
745:1425: eko vyapakṛṣṭo'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmānyadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāni vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikā pravrajanti tadanuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasāṃsaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayeyam |
745:1426: kṣīṇā me jātirūṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti |
745:1427: evamukte bhagavān yena gaṅgā nadī tena vyavalokayan vyavalokayati |
745:1430: paśyasiṃ tvaṃ bhikṣo nadyā gaṅgāyāḥ srotasā mahāntaṃ dāruskandhamuhyamānam |
745:1431: evaṃ bhadanta sa cedeṣa na pārime tīre saṃsrakṣyati |
745:1439: evameṣabhikṣo dāruskandho'nupūrveṇa samudranimno bhaviṣyati samudrapravaṇaḥ samudraprāgbhāraḥ |
745:1440: evameva sa cettvaṃ bhikṣo na pārime tīre saṃsrakṣyasi |
745:1443: evaṃ hi tvaṃ bhikṣo anupūrveṇa nirvānanimno bhaviṣyasi nirvānapravaṇo nirvāṇaprāgbhāraḥ |
745:1444: nāhaṃ bhadanta jāne kimapārimaṃ tīraṃ kiṃ pārimaṃ tīram |
745:1450: sādhu me bhagavāṃstathā saṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ deśayatu yathāhaṃ bhagavato'ntikātsaṃkṣiptena dharmaṃ śrutvā pūrvavadyāvat nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti |
745:1455: manuṣyagrāha iti yathāpī haikaḥ saṃsṛṣṭo viharati gṛhasthapravrajitaiḥ sahanandī sahaśokaḥ |
745:1456: sa sukhiteṣu sukhito duḥkhiteṣu dukhitaḥ utpannotpanneṣu kiṃ karaṇīyeṣu samādāya paryavasānānuvartī bhaviṣyati |
745:1457: amanuṣyagrāha iti yathāpīhaika iti praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ caratītyanenāhaṃ śīlena vā vratena vā (tapena vā)
745:1460: āvartagrāha iti yathāpīhaikaḥ śikṣāṃ pratyākhyāya hānāyāvartate |
745:1461: antaḥpūtībhāva iti yathāpīhaiko duḥśīlo bhavati pāpadharmā antaḥpūriravasrutaḥ kaṣaṃvakajātaḥ śaṃkhasvarasamācāraḥ |
745:1463: evaṃ hi sa cettvaṃ bhikṣo nāpārime tīre saṃsrakṣyasi pūrvavadyāvannirvāṇaprāgbhāraḥ |
745:1464: atha sa bhikṣurbhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato'ntikātprakrāntaḥ |
745:1466: eko vyapakṛṣṭo'pramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā viharan yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā āgārādanagārikāṃ pravrajanti tadanuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayate kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmityājñātavān |
745:1468: tena khalu samayena nando gopālako bhagavato nātīdūre sthito'bhūt |
745:1470: tena daṇḍenāvaṣṭabdho maṇḍūkaḥ sanchidyamāneṣu carmasu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu cittamutpādayati yadyahaṃ kāyaṃ cā cālayeyaṃ vācaṃ vā niścārayeyaṃ syādato nidānaṃ nandasya gopālasya kathābyākṣepamiti viditvā bhagavato'ntike cittamabhiprasādya kālagataścāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ |
745:1471: atha nando gopālako daṇḍamekānte upanikṣipya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
745:1480: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryamiti |
745:1487: labheyāhaṃ bhadantaṃ svākhyāte dhamavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryam |
745:1488: kiṃ cāpiṃ nanda daharā gāvastaruṇavatsā jñāsyanti svakasvakāni gokulāni |
745:1490: apitu karaṇīyametadgopālakena yathāpi tat svāmināṃ bhaktācchadanaṃ svīkurvatā |
745:1491: atha nando gopālako bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato'ntikātprakrāntaḥ |
745:1492: tato bhayaṃ bhayamityuccaiḥ śabdaṃ kurvāṇaḥ pradhāvitumārabdhaḥ |
745:1498: tān dṛṣṭvā anye'pi gopālakā aśvapālakāstṛṇahārakāḥ kāṣṭhahārakāḥ pathājīvā utpathājīvāśca manuṣyāḥ pradhāvitumārabdhāḥ |
745:1507: tataścāsau karvaṭakanivāsī janakāyastaṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā itaścāmutaśca santrastāḥ |
745:1518: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān śāriputrastasyāmeva varṣadi sanniṣaṇṇo'bhūtsannipatitaḥ |
745:1519: athāyuṣmān śāriputraściraprakrāntaṃ nandaṃ gopālakaṃ viditvā bhagavantamidamavocat |
745:1520: kasmādbhadanta bhagavatā nando gopālakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitukāmaḥ punarapyagārāyodyojitaḥ |
745:1521: asthānametacchāriputrāvanakāśo yannando gupālakaḥ punarapi gṛhī agāramadhyāvatsyati sannidhikāraparibhoge kāmān paribhokṣyati |
745:1523: idānīṃ nando gopālakaṃ svāmināṃ gā arpayitvā āgamiṣyati |
745:1524: sa yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇyācchādya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajanti tadanuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayamabhijñāyāsākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya pravedayiṣyati kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāmīti |
745:1525: athāpareṇa samayena nando gopālakaḥ svāmināṃ gā arpayitvā pañcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
745:1528: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣu bhāvaṃ careyamahaṃ bhagavato'ntike brahmacaryamiti |
745:1529: labdhavān nando gopālakaḥ pañcaśataparivāraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam |
745:1531: dharmatā aciropapannasya devaputrasya devakanyāyā vā trīṇi cittanyutpadyante |
745:1538: na mama pratirūpaṃ syādyadahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam |
745:1540: atha maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputraścalavimalakuṇḍaladharaḥ pūrvavadyāvatsarvaṃ gaṅgātīramudāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakīrya bhagavataḥ purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
745:1541: atha bhagavān maṇḍukapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ cāturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān |
745:1542: yāṃ śrutvā pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
745:1544: eṣo'haṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi dharmaṃ ca bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca |
745:1545: upāsakaṃ ca māṃ dhārayādyāgreṇa yāṃvajjīvaṃ prānopetaṃ śaraṇagatamamiprasannam |
745:1546: atha maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputro vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparibhukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśamāgatastayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ |
745:1550: kiṃ bhagavannimāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmāsahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraścatvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ |
745:1551: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatirna śakro devendro na catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
745:1552: api tu nandena gopālena daṇḍena vāvaṣṭabdho maṇḍūkaḥ sa cchidyamāneṣu carmasu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu mā nandasya gopālakasya dharmavikṣepo bhaviṣyatīti niścalastūṣṇīmavasthito mamāntike cittamabhiprasādya kālagataścāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣupapannaḥ |
745:1556: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
745:1557: kiṃ bhadanta nandena gopālena pañcaśataparivāreṇa karma kṛtaṃ yena gopālakeṣupapanno bhagavataśca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
745:1558: maṇḍūkapūrviṇā devaputreṇa kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena maṇḍūkeṣūpapannaḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtamiti |
745:1560: tenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvat phalanti khalu dehinām |
745:1561: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminneva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi |
745:1570: tāvarthārthinau tasya sakāśamupasaṃkrāntau pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā kathayataḥ |
745:1573: yadyahamanayoradyaivādhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamayiṣyāmi arthārthināvetau na bhūya upasaṃkramiṣyataḥ |
745:1574: tena sarvasaṃghaṃ saṃnipātya tadadhikaraṇaṃ saṃghamadhye upanikṣipya na ekāntī kṛtam |
745:1575: ataḥ parasminnapi divase tasya karvaṭake karaṇīyamutpannam |
745:1589: tairapyanusaṃvarṇitameva me tadupādhyāya gopālakairyathā tadadhikaraṇaṃ vyupaśamitamiti |
745:1590: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau tripiṭo bhikṣureṣa evāsau gopālakastena kālena tena samayena |
745:1591: yānyasya tāni paṃca sārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsikānāṃ śatāni etānyeva paṃca gopālakaśatāni |
745:1592: yadanena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śravakasaṃgho gopālakavādena samudācaritaḥ |
745:1593: sārdhaṃ vihāryantevāsikaiścānusaṃvarṇitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃca janmaśatāni paṃcaśataparivāro gopālakeṣūpapannaḥ |
745:1595: yadanena paṭhitaḥ svādyāyitaḥ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalamāyatanakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tenaitarhi paṃcaśataparivāreṇa mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam |
745:1596: maṇḍūkapūrvyapi devaputraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane bhikṣurāsīt |
745:1597: prāhāṇikaḥ sa janapadacārikāṃ caran anyatamasminkarvaṭake vihāramanuprāptaḥ |
745:1598: sa rātryāḥ prathame yāme paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā manasikāraṃ vāhayitumārabdhaḥ |
745:1604: sa madhyame yāme utthāya niṣaṇṇo yāvadanye bhikṣavaḥ svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti |
745:1606: sa paścime yāme utthāya niṣaṇṇo yāvadapare svādhyāyaṃ kurvanti |
745:1609: ime śramaṇāḥ kāśyapīyāḥ maṇḍukā iva kṛtsnāṃ rātriṃ raṭitā iti |
745:1610: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau prāhāṇiko bhikṣureṣa evāsau maṇḍūkapūrvī devaputraḥ |
745:1611: yadanena kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śrāvakā maṇḍūkavādena samudācaritāḥ |
745:1612: tasya karmaṇo vipākena paṃca janmaśatāni maṇḍūkeṣūpapanno yāvadetarhyapi maṇḍūkeṣvevopapannaḥ |

745:2404: tathā nandopanandp nāgarājo māndhātṛbalaṃ dṛṣṭvā asurā hyete iti caturaṅgena balakāyena pratyudgataḥ |

745:2537: sa eṣa tava kiṃ rathaṃ dāsyati |
745:2550: ko'yaṃ kuśaḥ kumāro bhadrakalpīyo bodhisattvaḥ khedamāpatsyate |

745:2574: yāvanmahāśakunirājñānyasya putrasyārthe vyājāntareṇa sā dārikā kuśasyānupradattā |
745:2575: nakṣatradivasamuhūrtadivasaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca kuśaḥ kumāro niveśitaḥ |
745:2583: ka eṣa piśācaḥ kumārāṇāṃ madhye krīḍati |

745:2589: tayā pradīpaṃ prajvālya kūḍṇīrakeṇa pracchādya sthāpitaḥ |
745:2594: sā kathayati piśācaḥ piśāca iti kṛtvā niṣpalāyitā |
745:2601: kiṃ yuṣmākaṃ pṛthivyāṃ puruṣā na santi yāhaṃ yuṣmābhiḥ piśācasyānupradattā |

745:2632: tasya yasminkarvaṭake sā patnī taṃ ca karvaṭakaṃ gataḥ |
745:2686: tadā śabdaḥ kṛtaḥ piśācaḥ piśāca iti |
745:2692: sā rājaduhitā yena labdhapūrvā tena śrutam |
745:2693: yā sā mama rājaduhitā labdhapūrvā sā kuśaṃ kumāraṃ parityajya svagṛhaṃ gatā |
745:2694: tena tasya rājñaḥ saṃdiṣṭam yadi tāvanme dārikāmanuprayacchasīti evaṃ kuśalam |
745:2697: eṣā mamā duhitā rājño mahāśakuneḥ putrasya kuśasya kumārasya pradattikā |
745:2699: sa caturaṅgena balakāyenāgatya tasya rājadhānīṃ veṣṭayitvāvasthitaḥ |
745:2700: sa rājā tena sārdhaṃ na śaknoti saṃgrāmaṃ saṃgrāmayitum |

745:2717: tatra vayaṃ kālajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kuśaḥ kumāraḥ paṃcaśatike dvau tūṇau baddhvā śaṃkhacakragadāṃ ca gṛhītvā nirgataḥ |
745:2730: tena tasya caturaṃgo balakāyo'nupradatto mahatā satkāreṇa sānupreṣitā |
745:2737: yena caturaṃgo balakāya ūḍhastatra nātidūre eḍhakāścaranti |
745:2749: ata eva iyaṃ rājaduhitā mamāntike aprasādaṃ pravedayati |
745:2757: kumāra mā khedamāpatsyase mā ātmānaṃ praghātaya |
745:2758: imaṃ cūḍāmaṇiṃ śirasi dhāraya pūrṇamanoratho bhaviṣyasi |
745:2775: tena sā purī catūratnamayīṃ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpitā |
745:2776: kuśena kumāreṇa vāsitamiti kuśāvatī kuśāvatīti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā |
745:2778: kuśo nāma balacakravartī teṣu ṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu yaġyavāṭāni māpayitvā bahūni varṣāṇi bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi brāhmaṇebhyo dānamadāt |
745:2779: sa ātmano yajñasaṃpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate |
745:2781: ko dānaṃ na prayaccheta saṃprattiryena labhyate || 86||
745:2783: dadāti dānaṃ paralokabhīruḥ śūreṣvasau śūrataro mato me ||87||
745:2784: na taṃ hi śūraṃ munayo badanti yaḥ śastrapāṇirvicaratyanīke |
745:2785: dānaṃ prayacchanti viśāradā ye śūrāṃstu tānsarvavido vadanti ||88||
745:2786: syāt khalu te mahārājānyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena kuśo nāma rājā babhūva balacakravartī yena tatṣaṣṭiṣu nagarasahasreṣu dānāni dattāni puṇyāni kṛtāni |
745:2788: api tvahameva tena kālena tena samayena kuśo nāma rājābhūvaṃ balacakravartī |
745:2789: mayaiva tatṣaṣṭiṣū nagarasahasreṣu yajñavāṭāni māpayitvā dānāni dattāni puṇyāṇi kṛtāni |
745:2790: syāt khalu te mahārāja tena mayā dānena vā dānasaṃvibhāgena vānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddheti |
745:2792: api tvabhūnme taddānamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau hetumātrakaṃ pratyayamātrakaṃ vā saṃbhāramātrakaṃ vā |

745:2797: kuśenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni ko'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati |

745:2799: api tūpātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
745:2801: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ caphalanti khalu dehinām ||89||
745:2804: asati buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukaṃpakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya |
745:2810: tena gṛhapatinā svayamevotthāya gṛhītvā niṣkāsitaḥ uktaśca |
745:2813: mā haivāyaṃ tapyeta atyantakṣataścopahataśceti viditvopari vihāyasamiti vistaraḥ |
745:2814: yāvattena satkṛto yāvatpādayornipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartumārabdha yanmayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ nāhamasya karmaṇo bhāgī syām |
745:2815: yattu kārāḥ kṛtā anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeya |
745:2816: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau gṛhapatireṣa evāsau kuśaḥ |
745:2817: yadanena pratyekabuddhasyantike kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāṣṭādaśabhiravalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ siṃhavaktākṛtimukhaśca saṃvṛttaḥ |
745:2818: yattu kārāḥ kṛtāstasya karmaṇo vipākena rājā saṃvṛtto balacakravartī |

745:3329: yāvadasau lubdhaka saptame divase pratigupte pradeśe ātmānaṃ gogayitvāvasthitaḥ |
745:3331: tena catasṛṣu dikṣu catvāraḥ khadirakīlakāḥ nikhātāḥ |
745:3334: lubdhakena śareṇa marmaṇi tāḍito niṣkośaṃ cāsiṃ kṛtvābhihitaḥ |
745:3337: mā te utkṛttamūlaṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā pṛthivyāṃ nipātayiṣyāmīti |

745:3340: tato nāgapoto mantrapāśabandhanādvinirmukto hradādabhyudgatya taṃ lubdhakaṃ pariṣvaktavānevaṃ cāha |

745:3349: tatra ṛṣiḥ prativasati maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sattvavatsalaḥ |
745:3352: yaccāsya janmacitreṇa nāgapotena sārdhaṃ vṛttaṃ tatsarvaṃ vistareṇa samākhyātam |
745:3354: kiṃ ratnaiḥ kiṃ vā te suvarṇena tasya bhuvane amogho nāma pāśastiṣṭhati taṃ yācasveti |
745:3355: tato lubdhako'moghapāśe jātatṛṣṇaḥ ṛṣivacanamupaśrutya punarapi nāgabhuvanaṃ gato yāvatpaśyati nāgabhuvanadvāre tamamoghaṃ pāśam |

745:3358: tato janmacitreṇa nāgapotenānyaiśca nāgapotaiḥ sasaṃbhramaṃ pratisaṃmodito ratnaiśca pravāritaḥ kathayati |
745:3359: alaṃ me ratnaiḥ kiṃ tvetadamoghaṃ pāśaṃ mamānuprayaccheti |
745:3365: yuṣmākameṣa garuḍabhayopadrutānāmupayogaṃ gacchati mama tvanena satatameva prayojanam |
745:3369: tena mātā pitarāvavalokya sa pāśo dattaḥ |
745:3370: tato'sau lubdhakaḥ pṛthivīlabdhaprakhyena sukhasaumanasyenāpyāyitamanā amoghaṃ pāśamādāya nāgabhuvanādabhyudgamya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ |
745:3371: yāvadapareṇa samayena dhanī rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
745:3372: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā |
745:3373: sa kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
745:3374: anekadhanasamuditaṃ me gṛhaṃ na me putro na duhitā |
745:3376: sarvaṃ ca svāpateyamaputrakamiti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti |
745:3382: so'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavarūṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīnanyāṃśa devatāviśeṣānāyācate tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāścatvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate |

745:3386: apitu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca |
745:3392: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ sammukhībhāvātputrā jāyante duhitaraśca |
745:3404: sa ceddārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |

745:3446: pūrvavadyāvadaṣṭāsu parīkṣāsūdghāṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ |

745:3513: sadyaḥ sa cetasi tu rāgaśareṇa viddhaḥ ||108||
745:3514: sa tāmatimanoharāṃ manoharāṃ gṛhītvā hastināpuraṃ gataḥ |
745:3516: tataḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā sārdhamupari prāsādatalagataḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
745:3517: manoharayā rupayauvanaguṇenaḥ sudhanaḥ kumāro'nekaiścopacāraśataistathāpahṛto yathā sudhanaḥ kumāro muhūrtamapi tāṃ na jahāti |
745:3519: tatraiko rājānaṃ saṃśrito dvitīyaḥ sudhanaṃ kumāram |
745:3520: yo rājānaṃ saṃśritaḥ sa rājñā purohitaḥ sthāpito bhogaiśca savibhaktaḥ |

745:3524: yathā tava sahāyo brāhmaṇo mama pitrā paurohitye sthāpitaḥ evamahaṃ tvāmapi paurohitye sthāpayāmīti |
745:3525: eṣa ca vṛttāntastena brāhmaṇena karṇaparaṃparayā śrutaḥ |
745:3527: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā kumāro rājyameva nāsādayiṣyati |
745:3529: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya rāġyo vijite anyatamaḥ kārvaṭiko viruddhaḥ |
745:3530: tasya samucchittaye rājñā eko daṇḍaḥ preṣitaḥ |
745:3536: deva kimarthaṃ svabalaṃ hāpyate parabalaṃ vardhyate |
745:3551: evaṃ deveti sudhanaḥ kumāro rājñaḥ pratiśrutyāntaḥpuraḥ praviṣṭaḥ |
745:3556: deva sudhanaḥ kumāro manoharayā atīva sakto na śakyate preṣayitum |
745:3558: nirgataḥ kumāro'ntaḥ purāt preṣayitavyo yathā manoharāyāḥ sakāśaṃ na praviśatīti |
745:3562: tataḥ kumāro nirgataḥ ukto gaccha kumāra sajjo balaugha iti |
745:3569: sa manoharāsantakaṃ cūḍāmaṇimādāya mātuḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayornipatya kathayati |
745:3571: ayaṃ cūḍāmaṇiḥ suguptaḥ sthāpayitavyo na kathaṃ cinmanoharāyā deyo'nyatra prānaviyogāditi |
745:3572: sa evaṃ mātaraṃ sandiśyābhivādya ca nānāyodhabalaughatūryaninādaiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ |
745:3573: anupūrveṇa janapadānatikramya tasya karvaṭakasya nātidūre'nya'nyatamadvṛkṣamūlaṃ niśrityaṃ vāsamupagataḥ |
745:3574: tena khalu samayena vaiśravaṇo mahārājo'nekayakṣaparivāro'nekayakṣaśataparivāro'nekayakṣasahasraparivāro'nekayakṣaśatasahasraparivārastena pathā yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣasamitaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ |
745:3575: tena tasya pathā gacchataḥ khagapathe yānamavasthitam |
745:3577: bahuśo'hamanena pathā samatikrānto na ca me kadācidyānaṃ pratihatam |
745:3584: na ca kasyacitprāṇinaḥ pīḍā kartavyeti divitvā pāṃcikaṃ mahāyakṣasenāpatimāmantrayate |

745:3587: tatheti pāṃcikena mahāyakṣasenāpatinā vaiśravaṇasya mahārājasya pratiśrutya divyaścaturaṃgo balakāyo nirmitaḥ |
745:3588: tālamātrapramāṇāḥ puruṣāḥ parvatapramāṇā hastinaḥ hastipramāṇā aśvāḥ |
745:3589: tato nānākhaḍgamusalatomaraprāsacakraśaktiśaraparaśvaghaḥ śastraviśeṣeṇa nānāvāditrasaṃkṣobheṇa ca mahābhayamupadarśayan mahatā balaughena pāṃcikaḥ karvaṭamanuprāptaḥ |
745:3593: tataste karvaṭakanivāsinaṃ balaughaṃ dṛṣṭvā vacca prākārapatanaṃ paraṃ viṣādamāpannā papracchuḥ |
745:3603: vyutpannā na vayaṃ rājño na kumārasya dhīmataḥ |
745:3606: tataḥ ucchritadhvajapatākāḥ pūrṇakalaśairnānāvidhatūryaninādaiḥ sudhanaṃ kumāraṃ pratyudgatāḥ |
745:3607: tena ca samāśvāsitāstadabhiprāyāśca rājabhatāḥ sthāpitā nipakāśca gṛhītāḥ parapratyayāśca nibaddhāḥ |
745:3608: tatastaṃ karvaṭakaṃ sphītīkṛtya sudhanaḥ kumāro nivṛttaḥ |
745:3609: dhanena ca rājñā tāmeva rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭaḥ |
745:3610: gṛdhreṇāgatya rājña udaraṃ sphoṭayitvā antrāṇyākṛṣya sarvaṃ tannagaramantrairveṣṭitaṃ sapta ca ratnāni gṛhaṃ praveśyamānāni dṛṣṭāni tato rājā bhītastrastaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo laghuladhvevotthāya mahā(rha)
745:3611: śayane niṣadya kare kapolaṃ dattvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ |
745:3612: mā haiva me ato nidānaṃ rāzyāccyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya vā antarāya iti |
745:3613: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ taṃ svapnaṃ brāhmaṇāya purīhitāya nivedayāmāsa |
745:3615: yādṛśo devena svapno dṛṣṭo niyataṃ kumāreṇa karvaṭako nirjitaḥ |
745:3616: vitathanirdeśaḥ karaṇīya iti iti viditvā kathayati |
745:3618: niyatamano nidānaṃ devasya rājyāccyutirbhaviṣyati jīvitasya vāntarāyaḥ |
745:3622: deva udyāne puṣkariṇī surūpā prāmāṇikā kartavyāḥ |
745:3625: tato devena snānaprayatena tām puṣkariṇīmekena sopānenāvataritavayam |
745:3648: śakṣyasi hyaparāṃ kartuṃ ghātayaināṃ manoharām ||112|| iti ||
745:3652: puṣkariṇī khātā sudhayā liptā saṃmṛṣṭā kṣudramṛgāṇāṃ ca rudhiramupāvartitam |
745:3660: tato manoharā sañjātaduḥkhadaurmanasyā yena sudhanasya kumārasya jananī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
745:3668: tatastayā sa cūḍāmaṇirvastrāṇi ca manoharāyai dattāni yuktā ca |
745:3669: putrike prāpte te kāle āgantavyamevaṃ mamopālambho na bhaviṣyatīti |
745:3670: tato rājā yathānirdiṣṭena krameṇa snānaprayato rudhirapūrṇāṃ puṣkariṇībhavatīrṇottīrṇaḥ |

745:6842: adhivāsayatvasmākaṃ bhagavan śvo'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhkikṣusaṃghena |
745:6844: atha pāpeyā mallā bhagavatastūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandhānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanātprakrāntaḥ |
745:6856: ayaṃ bhadanta roco mallamahāmātro na buddhe|
745:6858: sādhvasya bhagavāṃstathā dharmaṃ deśayad yathaiva buddhe'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe abhiprasīdediti |
745:6860: atha bhagavatā rocasya mahāmātrasya tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā roco mallamahāmātro buddhe'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe'bhiprasannaḥ |
745:6861: atha roco mallamahāmātraḥ utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantamidamavocat |
745:6862: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena |
745:6864: adhivāsayatu me bhagavānāhaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathā pāpeyā mallā anujñāsyanti |
745:6865: sacette roca pāpeyā malā anujñāsyanti evaṃ te'hamadhivāsayāmi |
745:6866: atha roco mallamahāmātro bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrānto yena pāpeyā mallāstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
745:6868: āgamayantu tāvad bhavanto yāvadahaṃ tatprathamataraṃ bhagavantaṃ bhojaye bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca |
745:6869: paścādyuṣmākamapi na duṣkaraṃ bhaviṣyati bhagavantaṃ bhojayituṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ caṃ |
745:6871: asmābhistatprathamataraṃ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgha upanimantrito na vayamanujānīya iti |
745:6873: yadi nānujānītha ekaṃ khādyakaṃ cārayāmi pānakaṃ ceti |
745:6876: anujānīmaḥ sacet saṃghagatā tena dakṣiṇā pratiṣṭhāpitā bhavati |
745:6879: bhavantastādṛśaṃ khādyakaṃ sajjīkuruta yenekenaiva paryāptirbhavati ahaṃ sarvopakaraṇāni dadāmīti |
745:6883: atha pāpeyā mallāstāmeva rātriṃ śucipraṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samupānīya pūrvavadyāvatpurastādbhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇāḥ |
745:6884: tato roco mallamahāmātraḥ khādyakaṃ cārayitumārabdhaḥ pānakaṃ ca |
745:6898: ehi buddha ehi dharma ehi saṃgha idaṃ gṛhāṇeti |
745:6901: praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ mamānuprayacchatha āhosvid yo'sau bhagavān dvipadānāmagrya iti |
745:6907: evaṃ dharme vaktavyaṃ yo'sau virāgāṇāmagrya iti |
745:6912: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān svātirnavāgatastaruṇo'cirapravrajitaḥ acirāgata imaṃ dharmavinayam |
745:6914: uktaṃ bhagavatā yaiścālpaṃ dattaṃ yaiśca prabhūtaṃ dattaṃ yaiśca praṇītaṃ dattaṃ yaiścāttamanaskaiḥ parikarma kṛtaṃ yaiśca prasannacittairabhyanumoditaṃ sarve te puṇyasya bhāgino bhavanti |
745:6916: sa kāṣṭhaṃ pāṭayitumārabdho yāvadanyatamasmātpūtidārusuṣirānniṣkramyāśīviṣeṇa dakṣiṇe pādāṅguṣṭhe daṣṭaḥ |
745:6917: sa viṣeṇa saṃmūrchito bhūtau patito lālā vāhayati mukhaṃ ca vibhaṇḍayati akṣiṇī ca samparivartayati |
745:6925: yadi na pravrajito'bhaviṣyat jñātibhirasya vikitsā kāritā abhaviṣyaditi |
745:6938: āryā yuṣmākameva śāstā sarvajño bhagavānsarvadarśī sa eva jñāysatīti |
745:6940: vikṛtabhojanaṃ bhikṣavaṃ uccāraḥ prasrāvaśchāyikāṃ mṛttikā ca |
745:6941: tatra uccāraḥ acirajātakānāṃ vatsakānāṃ teṣāmeva ca prasrāvaḥ |
745:6949: śakṣyasi tvamānanda mamāntikānmahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāmudgṛhya paryavāpya svāterbhikṣo rakṣāṃ kartuṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ viṣadūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ viṣanāśanaṃ sīmābandhaṃ dharaṇībandhaṃ ca |
745:6951: atha bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ bhāṣate sma |
745:6952: namo buddhāya namo dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya |
745:6953: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṃgale hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre śrībhadre sarvārthasādhani paramārthasādhani sarvānarthapraśamani sarvamaṅgalasādhani manase mahāmānase acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi |
745:6955: brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe mukte jīvate rakṣa svātiṃ sarvopadravabhayarogebhyaḥ svāhā |
745:6956: evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavato'ntikānmahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāmudgṛhya paryavāpya svāterbhikṣoḥ svastyayanaṃ kṛtam |
745:6958: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ |
745:6959: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvacca bhagavatā mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā bahukarā ca |
745:6960: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā mamātīte'pyadhvanyakṣaṇapratipannasya vinipatitaśarīrasyāpi mahāmūyūrī vidyārājā upakarā bahukarā ca |
745:6962: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo himavati parvatarāje dakṣiṇe pārśve suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājaṃ prativasati sma |
745:6963: so'nayā mahāmāyūryā vidyayā kālyaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā divā svastyayanena viharati |
745:6964: so'yaṃ svastyayanaṃ kṛtvā rātrau svastyayanena viharati |
745:6965: so'pareṇa samayena saṃbahulābhirvanamayūrībhiḥ sārdhamārāmeṇārāmamudyanenodyānaṃ parvatapārśveṇa parvatapārśvamatyarthaṃ kāmarāgaraktaḥ kāme'nugṛddho grathito mūrchito madamattaḥ pramuḍhaḥ pramūrchitaḥ pravicaranpramādādanyataraṃ parvatavivaramanupraviṣṭaḥ |
745:6966: sa tatra dīrgharātraṃ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrairhiṃsakairavatāra prekṣibhirmayūrapāśairbaddhaḥ |
745:6967: so'pyatra madhyagataḥ pramūḍhaḥ smṛtiṃ ca labdhvā imāmeva mahāmāyūrīṃ vidyāṃ manasyakārṣīt |
745:6968: tadyathā amale vimale nirmale maṅgalye hiraṇye hiraṇyagarbhe bhadre subhadre samantabhadre śrībhadre sarvāthasādhani paramārthasādhani sarvānarthapraśamani sarvamaṅgalyasādhani manasi mānasi mahāmānasi acyute adbhute atyadbhute mukte mocani mokṣaṇi araje viraje amare amṛte (amarāṇi)
745:6969: brahme brahmasvare pūrṇe pūrṇamanorathe mukte jīvate rakṣa māṃ sarvopadravebhyaḥ svāhā |
745:6971: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau suvarṇāvabhāso nāma mayūrarājastena kālena tena samayena |
745:6972: tadāpi mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ca etarhyapi mama mahāmāyūrī vidyā upakarā ca bahukarā ceti |
745:6973: paśya bhadanta yāvacca bhagavataḥ svāterbhikṣorvidyayā svastyayanaṃ kṛtam |
745:6976: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ nāgamaṇḍaliko'nyatamaḥ kṣatriyadārakaḥ sarpeṇa daṣṭaḥ |
745:6979: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo'sau nāgamaṇḍalikaḥ ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena |
745:6980: yo'sau dārakaḥ svātirbhikṣastena kālena tena samayena |
